description: CRITICAL SECURITY VULNERABILITY: Werkzeug debugger is enabled in production with EVALEX (code execution) enabled. Error pages reveal full stack traces, file paths, and the debugger secret token necessary for remote code execution.
notes: The Werkzeug debugger is accessible when errors are triggered (e.g., POST to /login without parameters). EVALEX is enabled allowing arbitrary Python code execution. The debugger secret is visible in the HTML. This allows complete system compromise.
